entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as the person to contact for simple jobs. He is also referred to as one of the twins who are running their own business.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as the twin brother of Fred and the person to contact for simple jobs.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as a prefect who wants to stop Fred and George's business.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as a prefect who does not want to stop Fred and George's business.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the person observing Ron's reaction to Hermione's suggestion.

relationships.description: Hermione mentions that they should contact Fred and George for simple jobs.
Ron is mentioned as being involved in Fred's business, but does not want to stop it.
Hermione tries to influence Ron to take action against Fred and George's business.
